resources.string:
BestFlix App made by: DAUMAS Timmy & LACOMME Antonin


 It lets you go through movies and tv shows and see their details and is based on developers.themoviedb.org


 First button lets you see the movies categories, the second one lets you see the tv shows categories and the last one is for this page.


 By clicking on the categories, you can see the movies / tv shows in that category and then clicking on a movie / tv show lets you see the details of that movie / tv show.
